channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- VMware Workstation Pro / Player (Workstation) and VMware Fusion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for n/a -- VMware Workstation Pro / Player (Workstation) and VMware Fusion

item.title: CVE-2023-20872|2023-04-25T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20workstation%20pro%20%2F%20player%20%28workstation%29%20and%20vmware%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an out-of-bounds read/write vulnerability in SCSI CD/DVD device emulation.

item.title: CVE-2023-20869|2023-04-26T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20workstation%20pro%20%2F%20player%20%28workstation%29%20and%20vmware%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation (17.x) and VMware Fusion (13.x) contain a stack-based buffer-overflow vulnerability that exists in the functionality for sharing host Bluetooth devices with the virtual machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-20870|2023-04-25T00:00:00 -- n%2Fa -- vmware%20workstation%20pro%20%2F%20player%20%28workstation%29%20and%20vmware%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation and Fusion contain an out-of-bounds read vulnerability that exists in the functionality for sharing host Bluetooth devices with the virtual machine.
